Room2: ^Hope you enjoyed that first room, because now we're going to try <color=#00d8ff>advanced dragging.</color>
^Grab the box and carefully manuever it around the obstacles by holding down <color=#00d8ff>Mouse1</color>. Please note that you will not be able to flick the box into any walls without breaking it.
^If you break the box, a new one will be supplied so that you can try again. Please note that these boxes are incredibly cheap and will often break as soon as they have the opportunity to.
^If you need to let go of the box gently, let go of <color=#00d8ff>Mouse1</color> while the cursor is over the box, or press <color=#00d8ff>Mouse2</color> to release it gently.
